== Description ==
Gets the current site name based on the value of the $current_site global variable.

== Usage ==
%%%<?php get_current_site_name( $current_site ); ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
$current_site

== Return Values ==
; (Object) : Returns $current_site object with site_name.

== Source File ==

<tt>get_current_site_name()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/ms-load.php}}.
